summary: This document is a chain of emails from October 2021 discussing the installation timeline of a camera system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The correspondence is between a Facilities Manager and a Special Agent from the OIG, and references a prior project to install cameras that began in March 2019, and a specific camera system that was installed the week of August 16, 2019, following the Jeffrey Epstein incident on August 10, 2019.

keyFacts: A camera system installation project at MCC New York was scheduled to begin on March 17, 2019.
A specific camera system was installed the week of August 16, 2019, which was after the Jeffrey Epstein incident on August 10, 2019.
The OIG was investigating the timeline of the camera system installation in relation to the Epstein incident.
The camera system in question was ordered on September 27, 2018, and estimated to have been delivered around October 14, 2018.
